author: LinOnetwo
description: Default game for tw-gamification, a simple store to buy bonus for yourself, and you are the store keeper.
name: Ego Store Lite
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/configs/AddToGameList":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/configs/AddToGameList","tags":"$:/tags/linonetwo/tw-gamification/Game","caption":"<<lingo "Name" "$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/">>","text":"EgoStoreLite"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/config":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/config","tags":"$:/tags/ControlPanel/TW-Gamification/SettingsTab","caption":"<<lingo "Name" "$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/">>","text":"\import [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/tiddlywiki-ui/procedure/sub-plugins-list]]
\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/
\define plugin-name() $:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite

<<lingo "ConfigDescription">>

---

!! <<lingo Golds/Caption>>

;<<lingo Golds/Count>>
:{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/configs/Golds}}
;<<lingo Golds/Reset/Caption>>
:<$button>
	<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/configs/Golds"/>
	<<lingo Golds/Reset/Caption>>
</$button> <<lingo Golds/Reset/Description>>

!! <<lingo SubPluginsList $:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/>>

{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/tiddlywiki-ui/procedure/sub-plugins-list}}

successful!"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Readme","text":"\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/

! <<lingo "Name">>

<<lingo "Description">>

!! 事件源

本插件不包含事件源，只包含游戏部分。你需要安装一些事件源插件。

对于符合「游戏太微」框架标准的宏，本插件也提供了统一的按钮展示界面，类似市面上的其它游戏化待办应用。

!! 游戏

本插件提供的游戏化玩法非常简单，就仅仅是提供了金币和经验数值记录，以及用金币购买商品的功能。商品可以自己创建，也可以使用游戏默认自带的，还可以从插件源里安装适配了本插件的商品插件。
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Name":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Name","text":"自我商店（极速版）"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Description","text":"「游戏太微」的默认游戏，在一个简单的商店里购买对自己的奖励，而且你自己就是店主"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/ConfigDescription":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/ConfigDescription","text":"通过这些设置，您可以自定义「自我商店（极速版）」插件的行为。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/GameLoading":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/GameLoading","text":"你的商店加载中……"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Golds/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Golds/Caption","text":"金币"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Golds/Count":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Golds/Count","text":"金币总量"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Golds/Reset/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Golds/Reset/Caption","text":"重置金币"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Golds/Reset/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Golds/Reset/Description","text":"将金币归零，这将清除所有的金币，没事别点。只涉及本插件的金币数量，不影响别的插件和游戏。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/ActionsList/Title":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/ActionsList/Title","text":"打卡行动列表"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Exit/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Exit/Caption","text":"退出游戏"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Create/Title/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Create/Title/Caption","text":"创建"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Create/Close":{"title" 图片条目。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateAction/Caption/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateAction/Caption/Caption","text":"展示标题"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateAction/Caption/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateAction/Caption/Description","text":"为行动提供一个用于展示的标题，如果不填则默认展示条目名。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateAction/Description/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateAction/Description/Caption","text":"描述"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateAction/Description/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateAction/Description/Description","text":"详细描述行动。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateAction/Enabled/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateAction/Enabled/Caption","text":"启用"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateAction/Enabled/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateAction/Enabled/Description","text":"切换以启用或禁用行动。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/ActionsList/ReceiveRewardWithCount":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/ActionsList/ReceiveRewardWithCount","text":"点击接收 份奖励"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Store/Title":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/Store/Title","text":"商店"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Caption","text":"创建商品"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Title/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Title/Caption","text":"商品的条目名"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Title/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Title/Description","text":"为新商品输入条目名。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Tags/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Tags/Caption","text":"标签"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Tags/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Tags/Description","text":"为商品指定标签。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/GoldAmount/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/GoldAmount/Caption","text":"金币数量"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/GoldAmount/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/GoldAmount/Description","text":"指定玩家购买此商品所需的金币数量。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/PurchaseMessage/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/PurchaseMessage/Caption","text":"购买消息"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/PurchaseMessage/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/PurchaseMessage/Description","text":"输入购买商品时展示给玩家看的消息。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Icon/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Icon/Caption","text":"图标"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Icon/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Icon/Description","text":"为商品选择一个图标，可以用 Emoji 或 SVG，也可以用嵌入语法引用 SVG 图片条目。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Caption/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Caption/Caption","text":"展示标题"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Caption/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Caption/Description","text":"为商品提供一个用于展示的标题，如果不填则默认展示条目名。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Description/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Description/Caption","text":"描述"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Description/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Description/Description","text":"详细描述商品。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Enabled/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Enabled/Caption","text":"启用"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Enabled/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/CreateGoods/Enabled/Description","text":"切换以启用或禁用商品。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/ConsumeGoods/NotifyAmountFailed":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/ConsumeGoods/NotifyAmountFailed","text":"金币不足，无法购买此商品"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/ConsumeGoods/NotifyConditionFailed":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/ConsumeGoods/NotifyConditionFailed","text":"不满足购买条件，无法购买此商品"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/ConsumeGoods/Success":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/zh-Hans/ConsumeGoods/Success","text":"购买成功！"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/Readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/Readme","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/

<<lingo Readme>>"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/actions-list/actions-list":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/actions-list/actions-list","tags":"$:/tags/ego-store-lite/main-tabs","caption":"{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/icons/action}} <<lingo ActionsList/Title>>","text":"{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/actions-list/receive-reward}}

<div class="ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list">
  <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/Tags/Gamification/action]!is[draft]]">
    <div class="ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item" data-title=<<currentTiddler>>>
      <div class="ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item-edit">…</div>
      <$button>
        <$action-sendmessage
          $message="tm-gamification-event-action"
          $param=<<currentTiddler>>
        />
        <div class="ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item-icon"><$transclude $field="icon"/></div>
        <div class="ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item-info">
          <h2 class="ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item-title">
            <$transclude $field="caption">
              <$fill $name="ts-missing">
                <$transclude $field="title"/>
              </$fill>
            </$transclude>
          </h2>
          <p class="ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item-reward"><$transclude $field="game-event-amount"/> <$transclude $field="game-event-type"/></p>
        </div>
        <div class="ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-description"><$transclude $field="description"/></div>
      </$button>
    </div>
  </$list>
</div>
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/actions-list/buttons-list.css":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/actions-list/buttons-list.css","text":".ego-store-lite-action-receive-reward{width:100%;margin-bottom:.5em}.ego-store-lite-action-receive-reward>button.receive-reward-button{width:100%;height:100%;font-size:1.2em}.ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list{display:flex;flex-direction:row;flex-wrap:wrap;width:100%;height:100%}.ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item{display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center;cursor:pointer;margin-bottom:20px;margin-right:20px;position:relative;width:250px;aspect-ratio:1}.ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item>button{width:100%;height:100%}.ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item-icon{font-size:3em}.ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item-info{display:flex;flex-direction:column}.ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item-title{font-size:1.2em;margin:0;user-select:none}.ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item-reward{font-size:.9em;color:orange;user-select:none}.ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item-edit{font-size:2em;border-radius:2em;opacity:.3;aspect-ratio:1;width:1em;position:absolute;top:.5em;right:.5em}.ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item-edit:hover{opacity:1}.ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item-edit:active{opacity:.7}.ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-description{user-select:none}","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/css"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/actions-list/actions-list.css.mobile":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/actions-list/actions-list.css.mobile","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/css","text":"@media (max-width:<<sidebarbreakpoint>>){.ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-container,.ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item{flex-direction:column}.ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item-info{align-items:center;text-align:center}}"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/actions-list/actions-list.css.variable":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/actions-list/actions-list.css.variable","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/css","text":".ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item{box-shadow:<<colour sidebar-foreground-shadow>>}"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/actions-list/receive-reward":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/actions-list/receive-reward","text":"\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/

<div class="ego-store-lite-action-receive-reward">
  <$button class="receive-reward-button">
    <<lingo ActionsList/ReceiveRewardWithCount>>

    <$let goldSaveFile="$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/configs/Golds">
      <$action-convert-game-event $eventTypes="SmallReward">
        <$action-createtiddler
          $basetitle=<<goldSaveFile>>
          $overwrite="yes"
          text={{{ [<gameEvents>enlistJsonFilterTypeGetEvents[SmallReward]jsonget[amount]sum[]] =[<goldSaveFile>get[text]else[0]] +[sum[]] }}}
        />
      </$action-convert-game-event>
    </$let>

  </$button>
</div>
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/create.css":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/create.css","text":".ego-store-lite-create-container{width:100%;height:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column}.ego-store-lite-create-container>button.ego-store-lite-create-button{font-size:3em;padding:1em;margin-bottom:.5em}","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/css"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/create":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/create","tags":"$:/tags/ego-store-lite/main-tabs","caption":"{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/icons/add-action}} <<lingo Create/Title/Caption>>","text":"\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/

<div class="ego-store-lite-create-container">
  <$button class="ego-store-lite-create-button">
    {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/icons/add-action}}
    <<lingo CreateAction/Caption>>
    <$action-createtiddler $basetitle="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newAction" $overwrite="yes" $template="$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/modal/create-action/create-action/new-action-template">
      <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/modal/create-action/create-action"/>
    </$action-createtiddler>
  </$button>
  <$button class="ego-store-lite-create-button">
    {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/icons/store}}
    <<lingo CreateGoods/Caption>>
    <$action-createtiddler $basetitle="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newGoods" $overwrite="yes" $template="$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/modal/create-goods/create-goods/new-goods-template">
      <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/modal/create-goods/create-goods"/>
    </$action-createtiddler>
  </$button>
</div>
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/modal/create-action/create-action-footer":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/modal/create-action/create-action-footer","text":"\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/

<div class="ego-store-lite-create-modal-buttons">
  <$button message="tm-close-tiddler">
    <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newAction"/>
    <<lingo Create/Close>>
  </$button>
  <$button
    message="tm-close-tiddler"
    disabled={{{ [[$:/state/ego-store-lite/newAction]get[draft.title]else[yes]] }}}
  >
    <$action-createtiddler
      $basetitle={{$:/state/ego-store-lite/newAction!!draft.title}}
      $template="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newAction"
      tags={{{ [{$:/state/ego-store-lite/newAction}get[tags]enlist-input[]] [[$:/Tags/Gamification/action]] }}}
    >
      <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newAction"/>
      <$action-deletefield $tiddler=<<createTiddler-title>> draft.title draft.of/>
    </$action-createtiddler>
    <<lingo Create/OK>>
  </$button>
</div>"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/modal/create-action/create-action":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/modal/create-action/create-action","subtitle":"<<lingo CreateAction/Caption>>","footer":"{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/modal/create-action/create-action-footer}}","text":"\import [[$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/tags]]
\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/

<div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-container">
  <div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field">
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-label"><<lingo CreateAction/Title/Caption>></span>
    <$edit-text tag=input tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newAction" field="draft.title" class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-input"/>
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-description"><<lingo CreateAction/Title/Description>></span>
  </div>

  <div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field">
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-label"><<lingo CreateAction/Caption/Caption>></span>
    <$edit-text tag=input tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newAction" field="caption" class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-input" placeholder={{$:/state/ego-store-lite/newAction!!draft.title}}/>
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-description"><<lingo CreateAction/Caption/Description>></span>
  </div>

  <div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field">
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-label"><<lingo CreateAction/Description/Caption>></span>
    <$edit-text tag=input tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newAction" field="description" class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-input"/>
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-description"><<lingo CreateAction/Description/Description>></span>
  </div>

  <div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field">
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-label"><<lingo CreateAction/Icon/Caption>></span>
    <$edit-text tag=input tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newAction" field="icon" class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-input"/>
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-description"><<lingo CreateAction/Icon/Description>></span>
  </div>

  <div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field">
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-label"><<lingo CreateAction/Tags/Caption>></span>
    <$let saveTiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newAction" currentTiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newAction">
      <$macrocall $name="edit-tags-template"/>
    </$let>
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-description"><<lingo CreateAction/Tags/Description>></span>
  </div>

  <!-- // TODO: add duplicate type tiddlers, and provide select widget here . And only show debounce-duration if find-duplicate is filled >
  <!-- <div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field">
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-label"><<lingo CreateAction/FindDuplicate/Caption>></span>
    <$edit-text tag=input tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newAction" field="find-duplicate" class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-input"/>
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-description"><<lingo CreateAction/FindDuplicate/Description>></span>
  </div>

  <div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field">
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-label"><<lingo CreateAction/DebounceDuration/Caption>></span>
    <$edit-text tag=input tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newAction" field="debounce-duration" class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-input"/>
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-description"><<lingo CreateAction/DebounceDuration/Description>></span>
  </div> -->

  <div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field">
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-label"><<lingo CreateAction/GameEventMessage/Caption>></span>
    <$edit-text tag=input tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newAction" field="game-event-message" class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-input"/>
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-description"><<lingo CreateAction/GameEventMessage/Description>></span>
  </div>

  <div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field">
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-label"><<lingo CreateAction/GameEventType/Caption>></span>
    <$select
      tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newAction"
      field="game-event-type"
      class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-input"
    >
      <$list filter='[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/Tags/Gamification/EventType]sort[text]]'>
        <option value={{!!text}}><$transclude field='caption'/></option>
      </$list>
    </$select>
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-description"><<lingo CreateAction/GameEventType/Description>></span>
  </div>

  <div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field">
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-label"><<lingo CreateAction/GameEventAmount/Caption>></span>
    <$edit-text tag=input type=number tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newAction" field="game-event-amount" class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-input"/>
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-description"><<lingo CreateAction/GameEventAmount/Description>></span>
  </div>

  <div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field">
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-label"><<lingo CreateAction/Enabled/Caption>></span>
    <$checkbox
      tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newAction"
      field="enabled"
      checked="yes"
      unchecked="no"
      class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-input"
    />
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-description"><<lingo CreateAction/Enabled/Description>></span>
  </div>
</div>
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/modal/create-action/create-action/new-action-template":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/modal/create-action/create-action/new-action-template","game-event-amount":"1","game-event-type":"SmallReward","enabled":"yes","draft.title":"","draft.of":""},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/modal/create-goods/create-goods-footer":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/modal/create-goods/create-goods-footer","text":"\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/

<div class="ego-store-lite-create-modal-buttons">
  <$button message="tm-close-tiddler">
    <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newGoods"/>
    <<lingo Create/Close>>
  </$button>
  <$button
    message="tm-close-tiddler"
    disabled={{{ [[$:/state/ego-store-lite/newGoods]get[draft.title]else[yes]] }}}
  >
    <$action-createtiddler
      $basetitle={{$:/state/ego-store-lite/newGoods!!draft.title}}
      $template="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newGoods"
      tags={{{ [{$:/state/ego-store-lite/newGoods}get[tags]enlist-input[]] [[$:/tags/ego-store-lite/goods]] }}}
    >
      <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newGoods"/>
      <$action-deletefield $tiddler=<<createTiddler-title>> draft.title draft.of/>
    </$action-createtiddler>
    <<lingo Create/OK>>
  </$button>
</div>"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/modal/create-goods/create-goods":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/modal/create-goods/create-goods","subtitle":"<<lingo CreateGoods/Caption>>","footer":"{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/modal/create-goods/create-goods-footer}}","text":"\import [[$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/tags]]
\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/

<div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-container">
  <div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field">
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-label"><<lingo CreateGoods/Title/Caption>></span>
    <$edit-text tag=input tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newGoods" field="draft.title" class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-input"/>
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-description"><<lingo CreateGoods/Title/Description>></span>
  </div>

  <div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field">
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-label"><<lingo CreateGoods/Caption/Caption>></span>
    <$edit-text tag=input tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newGoods" field="caption" class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-input" placeholder={{$:/state/ego-store-lite/newGoods!!draft.title}}/>
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-description"><<lingo CreateGoods/Caption/Description>></span>
  </div>

  <div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field">
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-label"><<lingo CreateGoods/Description/Caption>></span>
    <$edit-text tag=input tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newGoods" field="description" class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-input"/>
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-description"><<lingo CreateGoods/Description/Description>></span>
  </div>

  <div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field">
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-label"><<lingo CreateGoods/Icon/Caption>></span>
    <$edit-text tag=input tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newGoods" field="icon" class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-input"/>
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-description"><<lingo CreateGoods/Icon/Description>></span>
  </div>

  <div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field">
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-label"><<lingo CreateGoods/Tags/Caption>></span>
    <$let saveTiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newGoods" currentTiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newGoods">
      <$macrocall $name="edit-tags-template"/>
    </$let>
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-description"><<lingo CreateGoods/Tags/Description>></span>
  </div>

  <div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field">
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-label"><<lingo CreateGoods/PurchaseMessage/Caption>></span>
    <$edit-text tag=input tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newGoods" field="purchase-message" class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-input"/>
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-description"><<lingo CreateGoods/PurchaseMessage/Description>></span>
  </div>

  <div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field">
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-label"><<lingo CreateGoods/GoldAmount/Caption>></span>
    <$edit-text tag=input type=number tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newGoods" field="gold-amount" class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-input"/>
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-description"><<lingo CreateGoods/GoldAmount/Description>></span>
  </div>

  <div class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field">
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-label"><<lingo CreateGoods/Enabled/Caption>></span>
    <$checkbox
      tiddler="$:/state/ego-store-lite/newGoods"
      field="enabled"
      checked="yes"
      unchecked="no"
      class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-input"
    />
    <span class="ego-store-lite-new-item-field-description"><<lingo CreateGoods/Enabled/Description>></span>
  </div>
</div>
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/modal/create-goods/create-goods/new-goods-template":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/modal/create-goods/create-goods/new-goods-template","gold-amount":"1","enabled":"yes","draft.title":"","draft.of":"","purchase-message":"<<lingo Store/Title $:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/>>"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/modal/create-modal.css":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/create/modal/create-modal.css","text":".ego-store-lite-new-item-container{display:flex;flex-direction:column}.ego-store-lite-new-item-field{display:flex;flex-direction:column;margin-bottom:1em}.ego-store-lite-new-item-field-label{font-size:1.1em}.ego-store-lite-new-item-field-description{font-size:.7em}.ego-store-lite-create-modal-buttons{display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-between;width:100%}","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/css"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/exit":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/exit","tags":"$:/tags/ego-store-lite/main-tabs","caption":"{{$:/core/images/layout-button}} <<lingo Exit/Caption>>","text":"\whitespace trim
\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/

<<simple-layout-launcher>>
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/actions-list/game-procedure.css":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/actions-list/game-procedure.css","text":".ego-store-lite-container{width:100%;height:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column;overflow-y:scroll;padding:.5em}.ego-store-lite-container .tc-tab-buttons{font-size:2.5em;padding-top:0}","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/css"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/game-procedure":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/game-procedure","tags":"$:/tags/Global","text":"\whitespace trim
\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/

\procedure EgoStoreLite()

<div class="ego-store-lite-container">
  <$macrocall
    $name="tabs"
    tabsList="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ego-store-lite/main-tabs]]"
    explicitState="$:/state/tabs/ego-store-lite/1"
    default="$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/actions-list/actions-list"
  />
</div>

\end"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/icons/store":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/icons/store","tags":"$:/Tags/Image","text":"\parameters (size:"22pt")
<svg width=<<size>> height=<<size>> class="tc-image-store tc-image-button" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><g><path fill="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z"/><path d="M21 13v7a1 1 0 0 1-1 1H4a1 1 0 0 1-1-1v-7H2v-2l1-5h18l1 5v2h-1zM5 13v6h14v-6H5zm1 1h8v3H6v-3zM3 3h18v2H3V3z"/></g></svg>"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/store/buyGoodsNotification":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/store/buyGoodsNotification","text":"<<message>>"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/store/store-gold-count":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/store/store-gold-count","text":"\whitespace trim

<span class="store-gold-count">
  <<lingo Golds/Count>>
  <span class="store-gold-count-number">
    {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/configs/Golds}}
  </span>
</span>"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/store/store.css":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/store/store.css","text":".store-gold-count{text-decoration:underline;text-decoration-color:gold}.store-gold-count-number{font-size:1.1em;color:gold;margin:0;user-select:none}","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/css"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/store/store":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/store/store","tags":"$:/tags/ego-store-lite/main-tabs","caption":"{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/icons/store}} <<lingo Store/Title>> {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/store/store-gold-count}}","text":"\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/language/

<div class="ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list">
  <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ego-store-lite/goods]]">
    <div class="ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item" data-title=<<currentTiddler>>>
      <div class="ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item-edit">…</div>
      <$button>
        <$action-consume-reward-tiddler
          $tiddler="$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/configs/Golds"
          $amount={{!!gold-amount}}
          $notify-amount-failed="You do not have enough experience points."
          $notify-condition-failed="You do not have enough unconsumed game events."
        >
          <$action-sendmessage
            $message="tm-notify"
            $param="$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tiddlywiki-ui/store/buyGoodsNotification"
            message={{!!purchase-message}}
          />
        </$action-consume-reward-tiddler>
        <div class="ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item-icon"><$transclude $field="icon"/></div>
        <div class="ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item-info">
          <h2 class="ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item-title"><$transclude $field="caption"/></h2>
          <p class="ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-item-reward"><$transclude $field="game-event-amount"/> <$transclude $field="game-event-type"/></p>
        </div>
        <div class="ego-store-lite-game-buttons-list-description"><$transclude $field="description"/></div>
      </$button>
    </div>
  </$list>
</div>
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tree":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/tree","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<<tree prefix:"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite/">>"}}}
title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite
